article.title: Neutron star cooling and the rp process in thermonuclear X-ray bursts

multiple_choice_question.text: What is the most common decay time (τ) for X-ray bursts observed by RXTE-PCA, based on the cumulative distribution shown in Figure 1?
What percentage of X-ray bursts observed by RXTE-PCA have decay times (τ) shorter than 10 s?
Approximately what percentage of X-ray bursts observed by RXTE-PCA have decay times (τ) longer than 70 s?
What is the average decay time (τ) for X-ray bursts observed by RXTE-PCA?
What is the approximate peak bolometric flux observed in this X-ray burst from GS 1826-24?
What is the approximate blackbody temperature of the burst emission at its peak?
How does the best-fit \'fa\' factor, representing the change in pre-burst flux during the burst, evolve during the decay phase?
What does the bottom panel of Figure 2, showing the reduced chi-squared of the spectral fits, indicate about the quality of the fits?
choices: The fits are consistently excellent throughout the burst.
The fits are generally good, with some deviations.
The fits are poor, particularly during the peak.
The reduced chi-squared values provide no information about fit quality.

multiple_choice_question.text: Which of the three fitted models provides the best description of the observed decay in bolometric flux?
choices: All three models are equally good.

multiple_choice_question.text: What feature in the residuals for the power law fit (blue curve) is indicative of an additional component needing to be included in the model?
choices: A steep drop in residuals at early times.
A broad excess centered around 50 s.
A negative slope in the residuals.

multiple_choice_question.text: What does the presence of a Gaussian component in the best-fit model suggest about the physical processes contributing to the burst decay?
choices: The decay is entirely due to neutron star cooling.
The decay is dominated by the rp-process.
Both neutron star cooling and the rp-process contribute to the decay.
The Gaussian component has no physical significance.

multiple_choice_question.text: What is the approximate time scale (standard deviation) of the Gaussian component in the best-fit model?
